idea: To carry on the business either within or outside India of construction works including the business of general construction contractors, builders, developers, contractors, or all kinds of works viz. road, bridge, buildings, industrial/ residential/ commercial premises or factories, factory sheds, industrial complexes and to construct, erect, build, repair, re-model, demolish, develop, improve, grades, curve, pave, macadamize, cement; to own, sell, acquire, process, develop, construct, demolish, enlarge, rebuild, renovate, decorate, repair, maintain, letout, hire, lease, rent, maintain, pledge, mortgage or otherwise deal in construction of all description like land, buildings, flats, shops, commercial, educational and non-commercial complex, houses, building structures, malls, restaurants, multiplexes, auditoriums hospitals, clubs, holiday resorts, schools, colleges, places of worship, gallery, highways, gyms, airports, tower platforms, highways, tunnels, pipelines, hospitals, nursing homes, clinics, godowns, warehouses, factories, roads, paths, streets, sideways, courts, alleys, pavements and to do other similar construction and allied activities.
name: KEYS BUILDCON PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We all know How gifting plays an important role in our lives. Be it big or small, a function or business, gifting is an eternal part of the entire Globe. idea: Offroad Consultants is a partnership company headed by the managing partner Tejas Kothari who is Asia's only I4WDTA certified offroad instructor.  The company designs offroad tracks, trains drivers (recreational, armed forces and occupational) in the art of offroad, defensive and tactical driving and provides expert drivers for any offroad needs.
name: Offroad Consultants
